completions.nl_description: Carve out all size 2 rectangular sub-objects from objects of size 4.
Remove the inner pixels of all 4-sided polygon objects
Move all the odd-sized objects inside larger objects to form holes inside them.
Hollow out all objects of size 15 (excluding the border).
Hollow the interiors of all the filled rectangles.
Transform all enclosed objects to have hollow centers.
Remove the inner parts of all enclosed shapes.
Make holes in objects of colors C, R, F, and Y by changing the interior pixels (except the boundary) to color O.
Hollow out the center of all objects that are not on the border.
Move the internal cells of any group to the center of the group.
Clear columns 3 and 4 of objects in all groups.
Recolor the center cells of all objects to color O
Recolor the center elements of the hollow rectangles in the grid to color O.
Hollow all objects of size 9.
Remove the central part (2x2 area) of the filled rectangles in the grid.
Move all objects of color C, G, F, or Y one step inward.
Move the interior objects of color C, G, F, R, or Y, which form hollow rectangles, one step towards the center of the grid.
Recolor the interior of objects of shape enclosed to color O.
Make an internal 2x2 hole in objects of color C, G, F, and Y.
For objects of color different from O, replace their inner columns with O
Recolor the middle block of each rectangular object differently from its edges with color O.
Move the central cells of each 2x2 block towards the center.
Hollow all objects that are not of size 2x2.
Hollow rectangles in the input grid regardless of their positions
Move the internal objects to create a hollow structure for each identified block.
Hollow out the center of all enclosed objects.
Replace all the internal pixels of all objects with the background color.
Create a hollow rectangle by removing the interior cells of each object.
Recolor border cells to the main color of the object if they are different.
Recolor center objects of size 9 to empty cells except the borders
Make a hole in the middle of rectangular objects located in the center of the grid.
Move the center objects of each cluster towards the boundaries.
Hollow out the center of all the square objects.
Move all the odd-indexed objects of each group to the top of the object of group.
Remove the middle part of each object of size greater than 9.
Hollow out all enclosed objects by updating their inner cells to the background color O.
Introduce a hole within each rectangle of size 5x4 by changing the color of the inner 3x2 cells to 'O'.
Move objects positioned in the second column down and up to open spaces.
Move all objects towards the object of different color the largest number of times, and then recolor them to their original color.
Change interior objects to color O inside larger objects.
Move the inner objects within larger objects upward.
Move all central pixels of the square-shaped objects to color O.
Add holes to certain regions of specific colors
Delete the second and second last column of each object.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter)
        (apply
            (move_node left)
            (move_node left)
            (move_node right)
            (move_node right)
            (move_node_max left)
            (update_color O)
            (move_node_max right)
            (update_color O)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor the center objects within the larger shapes to the color O.
Hollow all objects of color different than O.
Create holes in the center of each large square object.
Hollow out the center of all objects larger than size 30
Make a hole inside the enclosed objects.
Move all objects of color different than O, leaving hollow spaces inside.
Change the color of the middle segment of each object to match the background color O.
Hollow out all square objects.
Move the inner objects within larger enclosing objects towards the center.
Move the internal objects within rectangular objects to create a hollow inside.
Recolor certain cells within specific objects as if marking a void within them.
For each object larger than 3x3, remove the 2x2 square connected to the center of the object.
Hollow rectangles.
Hollow out all objects.
For objects of color different than O, transform its cells in the center to O
Move the middle cells of objects that have height greater than or equal to 3 toward outside.

For each 'X' filled rectangle, move all internal pieces on the second row, excluding the border, upwards and leave unchanged. Likewise, move all 'R' filled rectangles on the second row internal pieces upwards and leave unchanged.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) X))
        (apply
            (move_node up))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) R))
        (apply
            (move_node up))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move the objects of size greater than 1, except the ones of color G, to break them into two parts.
Remove all objects of interior rows and columns while keeping their border intact.
Recolor the middle cell of each object's square grid to the color 'O'.
Clear the top and bottom rows of the interior of each large, rectangular object to match the height of smaller objects inside.
Recolor the middle cells in the square objects to color O.
Hollow the object in the 4th column and 3rd row where it saves the border to the original color.
Hollow out the interior objects with a solid border, keeping their outermost borders intact.
Change the middle of each horizontal and vertical line in the objects to the color O.
Recolor the center points of rectangular objects to color 'O'.
Recolor the central cells of all the large objects to 'O'.
Make hollow the objects of shape enclosed.
Move the inner objects within larger objects one step toward the center of the larger object.
Remove the inner cells of all square objects.
Move the second row of objects (excluding the first and last columns) inside objects that have neighbors with the same size.
Recolor the objects of size 9 to color O and move the objects of size 36 to color O if they are neighbors of the object color O.
Remove interior parts of all solid objects in the grid.
Move the centermost pixels of objects upward while preserving their shapes.
Move all objects of size 9 to the top left position maintaining their form.
Move the objects of size greater than 9 one cell to the right and recolor them to their own color.
Cut the columns of each object in the middle.
Hollow all objects of size larger than 2.
Move all objects of size 6 to the position one step left to their current position.
Hollow out the objects exactly in the middle row in the middle column.
Move all objects inside a larger same-color object, leaving a hole in the center.
Move the central columns of each large rectangle towards their respective sides.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) 30) (column_equals (column_of this) 6)))
        (apply (move_node left))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) 12) (column_equals (column_of this) 2)))
        (apply (move_node right))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: For all objects in the grid, remove the interior cells such that they form a hollow shape.
Hollow out all squares of size 5.
Hollow out the inner parts of all the objects.
Move the center rows of each rectangle towards the center while retaining its color.
Create a hollow square with the same color for each square object.
Change all objects in columns 3 to n-3 leaving only their border unchanged.
Recolor the centers of all colored rectangular objects except for the top and bottom rows.
Transform the neighboring objects of the background color into hollow rectangles.
Create a vertical hollow rectangle in the middle of solid rectangles.
Hollow out the center cells of all rectangular objects of size greater than 1.
Hollow out the interior of all objects of size 25.
Move the interior pixels of objects larger than 9 (excluding the borders), preserving their relative positions within the object.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (and
                (size_equals (size_of this) 16)
                (not (neighbor_of this other))
            )
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node up_left false)
            (extend_node up_right false)
            (extend_node down_left false)
            (extend_node down_right false)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Remove the second and fifth columns of each object in the grid.
Move all objects toward the center of their own shapes and leave a trail behind.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter)
        (apply
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node right false)
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
        )
    )
)
